data.title: Thayer, Ebenezer, 1721 -
data.text: Ebenezer Thayer was born in Braintree, Massachusetts in 1721 and during his long political career served the colony and town in a number of capacities including as representative from Braintree ( 1760-74, 1783-90, 1792 ) as well as selectman for the town (1747, 1750, 1756, 1759-72, 1774, 1775, 1778, 1779, 1782-86, 1788). Among the many issues he dealt with during his time as representative was the petition of the selectmen of Sherborn seeking recompense for the support and care of Sarah Wamsquam. Schutz, Legislators of the Massachusetts General Court, 357. Petition of the Selectmen of the Town of Sherborn to the Massachusetts General Court, 1771.04.03.01.
